extension.dc:title: GGBN DNA Cloning Extension
extension.name: Amplification
extension.dc:description: Support for DNA Cloning as an extension for Material Sample core sample data in Darwin Core. Intended to be a one to many relation to the Material Sample core.

property.name: cloningDate
property.dc:description: Date when the DNA cloning was carried out

property.name: cloningStaff
property.dc:description: Person or Institution who performed the cloning

property.name: cloningMethod
property.dc:description: Method or protocol used for DNA cloning

property.name: cloneStrain
property.dc:description: Name of the individual DNA clone

property.name: primerNameForward
property.dc:description: Name of forward primer used for this cloning

property.name: primerReferenceCitationForward
property.dc:description: link to the first reference of this cloning primer

property.name: primerReferenceLinkForward
property.dc:description: Link to the first reference of this cloning primer

property.name: primerNameReverse
property.dc:description: Name of reverse primer used for this cloning

property.name: primerReferenceCitationReverse
property.dc:description: link to the first reference of this cloning primer

property.name: primerReferenceLinkReverse
property.dc:description: Link to the first reference of this cloning primer

property.name: lib_reads_seqd
property.dc:description: Total number of clones sequenced from the library

property.name: lib_screen
property.dc:description: Specific enrichment or screening methods applied before and/or after creating clone libraries in order to select a specific group of sequences e.g. enriched, screened, normalized

property.name: lib_size
property.dc:description: Total number of clones in the library prepared for the project

property.name: lib_vector
property.dc:description: Cloning vector type(s) used in construction of libraries

property.name: lib_const_meth
property.dc:description: Library construction method used for clone libraries e.g. paired-end,single,vector

property.name: plasmid
property.dc:description: Name of plasmid used for sequencing
